summary: Makes daggers "stronger" by making them benefit from mace, sword and axe perks :D
descriptionHtml:
what this mod does?

This mod edits Bonebreker, Hack and Slash and Bladesman perks to apply on daggers also. I also changed the name of Bonebreaker into armor piercing since having "bonebreaker" apply to dagger feels stupid, LOL.

Finally you can use dagger as damn main weapon and not only in sneak. Although having armor pierce in sneak will make it OP , hence i put this mod in cheats :p
author: Jasmin Husic
